ComicInfo.Summary:
Notorious Chapter Five: Notorious intervenes to save the police officers Falcone & Novak from Murtha's mob and realizes that while he only donned his costume to bring down Murtha, he might be a real super hero after all.
Sins of the Father Part Five of Five: Using the Strong-Suit, Smasher easily kills two of the sons; the third surrenders, but Smasher kills him anyway, to the horror of the rest of Dynamo 5. With the crisis over, Smasher apologizes to the others for what he did and claims he's sorry, but Wraith reads his mind and sees he isn't sorry at all.
ComicInfo.Title: Notorious Chapter Five; Sins of the Father Part Five of Five
